forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny, with a high near 81. Southwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
